member.name: T:System.Collections.Generic.ByteCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Set of utility extension methods for byte arrays.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.ByteCollectionExtensions.IsEqualTo(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte},System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte})
member.summary: Checks whether two byte collections are equal based on their content.
member.param: The source byte array to check.
The second byte array to check.
member.returns: true if the contents of the two byte arrays are equal.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.ByteCollectionExtensions.IsEqualTo(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte},System.Byte[])
member.summary: Checks whether two byte collections are equal based on their content.
member.param: The source byte array to check.
The second byte array to check.
member.returns: true if the contents of the two byte arrays are equal.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.ByteCollectionExtensions.IsNullOrZeroed(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte})
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified byte array is null, does not contain any elements or consists of only zero value items.
member.param: The byte array to test.
member.returns: true if the byte array is null, does not contain any elements or consists exclusively of zero value items.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.ByteCollectionExtensions.IsZeroed(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte})
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified byte array is does not contain any elements or consists of only zero value items.
member.param: The byte array to test.
member.returns: true if the byte array is null, does not contain any elements or consists exclusively of zero value items.
member.exception: Thrown if the byte array is null.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.ByteCollectionExtensions.ToString(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte},System.String)
member.summary: Creates a string from a byte array that concatenates each item in the array, separated by the specified delimiter.
member.param: The byte array from which to create the string.
The optional delimiter to separate each item in the array.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.ByteCollectionExtensions.GetBytesUptoSequence(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Retrieves the bytes from a byte array upto a specific sequence.
member.param: The byte array.
The index in the array to start checking from.
The sequence to search for.
member.returns: An array of bytes from the starting index to the matching sequence.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.CollectionExtensions.AddRange``1(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Adds the elements of the specified to the collection
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of the collection
member.param: The collection to add the items to.
The whose elements should be added to the end of the collection. The itself cannot be null, but it can contain elements that are null, if type T is a reference type.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.CollectionExtensions.Fill``1(System.Collections.Generic.IList{``0},``0)
member.summary: Populates each item in a byte collection with a specific value.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of the collection
member.param: The byte array to be populated.
The value to populate the byte array with.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.CollectionExtensions.IsEmpty``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified collection is empty.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of the collection
member.param: The collection to test.
member.returns: true if the collection is empty; otherwise false.
member.exception: Thrown if the source collection is null.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.CollectionExtensions.IsNullOrEmpty``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified collection is null or does not contain any elements.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of the collection
member.param: The collection to test.
member.returns: true if the collection is either null or empty; otherwise false.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.CollectionExtensions.None``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Determines whether none of the elements of a sequence satisfies the specified condition
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of collection.
member.param: An whose elements to apply the predicate to.
A function to test each element for a condition.
member.returns: true if any elements in the source sequence pass the test in the specified predicate; otherwise, false.
member.exception: Thrown if source or predicate is null.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.CollectionExtensions.Range``1(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{``0},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns the range of elements from the specified start and end index of a collection.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of collection.
member.param: The collection.
The inclusive start index of the range. If null, then this will default to zero.
The exclusive end index of the range. If null, then this will default to the number of elements in the collection.
member.returns: An with the elements from the specified range.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.CollectionExtensions.ToArray``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,System.Boolean},System.Func{``0,``1})
member.summary: Converts selected elements of the specified collection to an array of another type.
member.typeparam: The type of elements in the source collection.
The type of elements in the target array.
member.param: The source collection.
A delegate that controls the elements that are included in the target array.
A delegate that converts elements from the source collection type to the target array element type.
member.returns: An array of the target element type.
member.exception: Thrown if the source collection, predicate delegate or converter delegate are null.

member.name: T:System.Collections.Generic.EnumIterator
member.summary: Provides iterators for enum types. Can be used in a LINQ expression.

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.EnumIterator.For``1
member.summary: Generates an iterator for the enum type specified by the TEnum generic parameter.
member.typeparam: The enum type to generate the iterator for
member.returns: An generic iterator that can iterate over the values of TEnum

member.name: M:System.Collections.Generic.EnumIterator.For(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an iterator for the enum type specified by the TEnum generic parameter.
member.param: The enum type to generate the iterator for
member.returns: A non-generic iterator that can iterate over the values of the enum
member.exception: Thrown when the specified type is null
Thrown when the specified type is not an enum
